Theodore Richard White (March 25, 1931 October 26, 2020) bụ ónyé ọchụnta ego America, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé na'emepụta egwu na ónyé si Detroit, Michigan.
White bụ onye njikwa na di mbụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwu mkpụrụ obi Aretha Franklin
Dị ka ónyé na-ede egwu, White dere ma ọ bụ soro dee egwu màkà Franklin, gụnyere "I Wonder (Where You Are Tonight)", "Lee Cross", "Dr
A mụrụ White na Detroit, Michigan, na Machị 25, 1931. A kọwara ya na 1968 dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na ụlọ Detroit na onye na-azụ ahịa
White kọwara onwe ya dị ka ónyé na-akwalite sandlot tupu ọ weghara ọrụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwu Aretha Franklin na 1961.

Ónyé na-agụ egwu Della Reese mere ka Franklin márá White na Twenty Grand Club na Detroit. Mgbe izu ole na ole nke mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị gasịrị, ónyé ikpe nke udo lụrụ ha mgbè ha na-eme njem Ohio na 1961, mgbe Franklin dị afọ 18 na White dị afọ 30
Onye na-emepụta Motown bụ Harvey Fuqua kọwara White dị ka ónyé na-ere ahịa.
White nwụrụ na October 26, 2020 na Detroit, Michigan, afọ 89. Malcolm Barrett gosipụtara White na ógè nke atọ nkè usoro anthology, Genius, na Marlon Wayans na 2021 Aretha Franklin biopic, Respect.
